profile.greeting: Welcome to Humans Of FAST NUCES, {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to interact with the bot and the page. We hope you enjoy the experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc

facebook.title: At the FB page for "Humans Of FAST NUCES", you can see additonal details
facebook.subtitle: Here, you can see your post once it has been published
facebook.visit: Visit the FB page at https://fb.me/HumansAtFAST

website.title: The website contains all the info about the project

picture.starting: Share a picture with the rest of FAST NUCES!
picture.method: Share a picture immediately in the next reply
picture.caption: After the picture, reply with the caption in the next message

write.intro: Hello, {{ userFirstName }}! Welcome to the writing section!
write.prompt: If you already know what to write, please go ahead with "continue"
write.template: Maybe you want some ideas before you go ahead?
write.starting: {{ userFirstName }}, Reply immediately in the your next message what your wanted to be posted
write.anonymity: Do you wish to remain anonymous?
write.schedule: Do you want to schedule it to be posted at some other time?

suggestion.starting: Hmm, maybe you can write about ...
suggestion.template_1: What is your most recent listened song ? Why did you like it?
suggestion.template_2: What are you learning these days?
suggestion.template_3: Favorite series or movies this quarantine?
suggestion.template_4: What's up on your mind? Stressed out or chilling?
suggestion.template_5: What hobbies do you have? And why?
suggestion.tmeplate_6: How did you find yourself in CS anyways?
suggestion.template_7: Got any memes or jokes to share?
suggestion.template_8: Any university stories you wanna share?
suggestion.template_9: Funny story from back in school or college?
suggestion.template_11: What's something you're execptionally good at?
suggestion.template_12: What was your last dream about?
suggestion.template_13: Favorite food? Ever cooked? Favorite place to eat?
suggestion.template_14: What are your plans for the future?

get_started.welcome: Humans Of FAST NUCES is a page to bring together the literature and writing community at FAST NUCES
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the features
get_started.help: What do you want to do today?

leadgen.promo: Hi {{userFirstName}}, sharing the writer inside you is now easier.
leadgen.title: 50% Coupon
leadgen.subtitle: Here is your coupon
leadgen.coupon: Added your coupon to this thread, you can now check out the discounted summer collection

curation.prompt: Are you looking for an outfit for yourself or someone else?
curation.occasion: Great! Let's get started. First, is there an occasion in mind?
curation.price: How much are you looking to spend?
curation.title: Summer collection 2019
curation.subtitle: Featured outfit

order.prompt: We'll be happy to help you. Select from the following
order.number: Sure, please write the order number
order.status: Your order is on it’s way, expect to have it in 3 days.

care.prompt: To connect you with the right team please let me know what this is about?
care.issue: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you with any questions you might have about your {{topic}}.
care.default: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you today. How can I help you?
care.style: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I’m here to answer questions you might have on our summer styles
care.end: This is as far as the demo goes. Leverage the power of the messenger platform for your business. See https://fb.me/get-sample-oc to learn how to build a similar experience

survey.prompt: Hi, want to get quick feedback on your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}
survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for visiting our store, be sure to check out all the great styles we have on the summer section.

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
